title: A Walk in Hell
description: Coming 2015Paranormal Romance YACan you die in a dream? Allie is a foster child with her fair share of problems. Ordinary problems are the least of her worries when she realizes she can pass through solid objects. One moment sheâ€™s alone in a room, the next moment a strange apparition materializes before her. With each new behavioral issue, as the foster system calls it, Allie is shuffled off to a new group home. During her latest home relocating bus ride, a mysterious man boards. Shackled in handcuffs and escorted by a police officer. He should raise all of Allie's alarms, but doesn't. Passed around the foster care system, she's never had a place in this world. Until now. www.amyrachiele.comRelease change: This book will hopefully be coming in 2015. Look for my other releases in 2015, Mobster's Bones, Winter's World, and Follow the Blood Lines.
author: A.T. DeWinter
